projects.name: CovrLettr
projects.stack: Vanilla JavaScript, MongoDB, Mongoose, Express, Jest, NodeJS
projects.desc: A cover letter generator that takes user input for a series of questions and creates up to a million unique cover letters and returns the version with the highest sentiment score.

projects.name: Columns and Rogues
projects.stack: HTML, CSS, Vanilla Javascript, NodeJS, Express, PostgreSQL
projects.desc: Rogue-like game where the objective is to reach the hidden door.  The user will fight monsters and discover gold and items, with each level increasing the board size.

projects.name: Notable Notes
projects.stack: HTML, CSS, Vanilla Javascript, NodeJS, Express, MongoDB, Mongoose, JWT, BCryptJS
projects.desc: Simple note taking app that allows users to keep notes separated by subject.  The notes persist for each user upon login/out by utilizing a database.

projects.name: Offbeat
projects.desc: A sound sampler using Web Audio API that allows users to choose from multiple sound banks.  Once logged in, the user can record note combinations and play the same sequence back using different sound banks.

work.title: IT Logistics Specialist
achievements: Maintained inventory by updating spreadsheets and asset management system
Performed system inspections and provided detailed inspection notes
Imaged multiple system types for deployment and repaired systems when possible

about: Full-stack software developer with a focus on the front-end and a drive to create enjoyable UI and memorable UX. With a history in fine arts, I have cultivated a keen eye for detail and pleasing aesthetics.  I am devoted to growing and nurturing my technical knowledge, and eagerly anticipate finding creative ways to solve problems.

achievements: Awarded scholarship for summer printmaking workshop at Anderson Ranch Arts Center, Snowmass Village, CO- Summer 2009
